channel.title: The Helical Expeditions - BREAK!! Adventures
channel.description: Fan-made adventures for the BREAK!! tabletop RPG, set across the Outer World. New adventures published periodically.

item.title: Of Cats and a Rat [Rank 3-4]
item.description:
Blazing Garden — Pride Coast

Location: Nyanko

In the orderly streets of Nyanko, home of the Rai-Neko, a cunning rat has upset the delicate balance. Unravel the mystery in this feline-themed urban adventure.

item.title: Prickly's Prickly Situation [Rank 1-2]
item.description:
Blazing Garden — Thunda Sands

Location: Cereus Plateau

A perfect starter adventure! Help a friendly cactus creature deal with some unexpected trouble on the Cereus Plateau.

item.title: Hold the Wall [Rank 8-9]
item.description:
Wistful Dark — Aiden

Location: The Red Wall

Stand with the defenders of Aiden against the Hollow Queen's relentless forces. A desperate battle on the ancient Red Wall that divides civilization from darkness.

item.title: Sinking the Float Stone Mine [Rank 5-6]
item.description:
The Twilight Meridian — Seven Holy Isles

Location: Go Isle's Float Stone Mine

Investigate strange happenings at a float stone mine. Something sinister lurks in the depths, threatening to bring the whole operation crashing down.

item.title: Crash Landing! [Rank 5-6]
item.description:
Blazing Garden — No-Folk Land

Location: Death Valley

A vessel has crashed in the monster-infested Death Valley. Rescue the survivors before the colossal creatures of No-Folk Land claim them.

item.title: Thunda Circuit [Rank 3-4]
item.description:
Blazing Garden — Thunda Sands

Location: Deadstone

Race through the scorching Thunda Sands in this high-octane adventure featuring mechanical beasts and desert outlaws.

item.title: Danger for a Rokko-Do [Rank 2-3]
item.description:
The Twilight Meridian — Seven Holy Isles

Location: Winding Pass

A beloved rokko-do (a gentle beast of burden) has gone missing in the treacherous Winding Pass. Can you brave the dangers to rescue it?

item.title: Deal with a Sea Witch [Rank 7-8]
item.description:
The Twilight Meridian — Sunken Isles

Location: Dia, Beneath the Waves

Dive into the depths of the Sunken Isles where an ancient sea witch holds court. Navigate treacherous underwater ruins and negotiate with creatures of the deep.
